description: The classic ingredients for a mojito are white rum, sugar, lime juice, mint, and soda water. The Fig Mojito is a delightful variation of the original, perfect for cooling off on a hot day. Fresh figs and mint are muddled together, and then vanilla bean simple syrup is used in place of sugar.
